reviews.review: Where is portal 3?
Не люблю игры с загадками, но тут меня зацепили персонажи. Проходил испытания только для того чтобы послушпть их пазговоры.
nice

Um dos melhores jogos que joguei até hoje. Divertido e surpreendente, Portal 2 é um clássico. Com uma história muito misteriosa, faz-nos querer jogar sempre mais do que uma vêz!

Recomendo a todos os que gostem de bons Puzzels e de fantásticas personagens!

真心赞的游戏！音乐很赞！剧情发展很赞！而且通关过程全程有值得吐槽的地方，有萌萌的炮塔，还有很多隐藏的东西，[spoiler]一些成就要去作死才能完成[/spoiler]，而且还能和基友一起玩！


值得玩和评测的一款游戏！！！
dank
Portal 2 è un'esperienza. E' perfetto sotto tutti i punti di vista.
Best logistic game ever :3

Short Review: Great game, exciting story, fun to play with friends.
good game
reminded me that I don't have any friends to play co-op mode.
Skvělé pokračování logické hry.
Funny, charming, and gleaming with top-notch characters and voices all while combining its predecesor's brilliant use of puzzles, Portal 2 is a fabulous example of how to do a sequel right.

Technically the very first game I had on my account.

10/10 would lose code to get it for free again
Excellent. Wish there were less loading screens, but otherwise it's a very good game. Nice singleplayer, fun coop, simple level editor and workshop support - neat.
nice game

Эту игру создали гениальные люди, которым не чужда наука, робототехника, кибернетика и приколы с этим со всем связанные)
Шикарная остроумная интеллектуальная игра.

.
简直太好玩了.

Portal 1 was great, hard to top that. This concludes not only the story, it gives you a nice Coop Mode, kind of a prequel to the singleplayer campaign and a great, easy to use map editor, which uses the Steam Workshop.

For me, with this game Steam and the Steam community came to be. 

The story is funny as usual, Glados and Weatly are really great for laughs and your adventures in the Aperture Inc. are diversified and it never gets boring. To the very end.

After all those hours I still play it regularly and for now I don't think why to stop. The possibilities are just endless.
Story is very long and exciting to play, very clever and intersting champers with amusing story-line. I cannot have enough of this amazing game. Looking forward to play the next sequence.

[h1]Egy jó logikai játék, nagy online támogatással[/h1]
[list]
  [*]A Worksopban rengeteg közösségi "pálya" közül válogathatunk
  [*]Nagy a felhasználói bázis és használható a multiplayer mód
  [*]A tetejébe van közösségi multi pálya is...
  [*]Jó a story, az effektek is tökéletesek
[/list]
This game is great can't wait for a sequel. DO IT VALVE!

Portal é meu jogo de ficção científica favorito. 
Ah como eu gosto de ficção científica. 
É nível cinematográfico, fantástico e estupidamente bom.
Awesome Game!!
nagyon kedves a steam fogja magát azt törli a 20 eurós játékot azt adnak 1 centet.

Played this game back on it's release day on PS3 (even during the outages), and I prefered it to Red Dead Redemption, GTA IV, LA Noire and Undead Nightmare DLC (I got all them at the same time for a present), which is saying something. This game is the funniest game I've played and I can recommend with open arms, whether you like puzzle games or not.

Excelente continuación de Portal, esta vez con una historia más profunda y directa que el primero.

Es muy similar a Portal, las mecánicas son las mismas, aunque se agregan geles que ayudan a resolver algunos puzles. Es muy entretenido escuchar a GLadOS y a Wheatley (aunque prefiero evitar el doblaje al español), e incluso a Cave Johnson durante una sección en el juego.

El cooperativo y los mapas creados hacen que el juego virtualmente no tenga fin.

Muy recomendable.

This is officially the best game I have ever played. It has an amazing soundtrack, humor, and a deep stoyline that pulls you in but still leaves many details out. If you haven't gotten it already I highly reccomend that you do.
~10/10~ Must buy, a favorite of mine.

This is more than a game, it's a piece of indescribable art, it's worth more than all the money you can ever imagine.

Stop reading reviews and go play it now!
just as good as the first one
мой мозг взорвался
buy this game
This game is so amazing , just cant explain this in words . You need to try it ur self . 10/10 , you need to use your head in this game ;) Good luck and rage much :))

Kann ich nur empfehlen :3
(ich hab ca 8h offline gespielt)

Jedna z nejlepších her co může být.
PS: těším se až vyjde Portal 3

Igual que su predecesor, pero mejorado en todos los aspectos. 

La historia que nos muestra está bastante más elaborada, hay muchísimas más mecánicas aparte de los portales/cubos y los toques de humor constantes son geniales.

La B.S.O ha mejorado mucho.

La duración se ha incrementado considerablemente (tampoco vayas a pensar que te va a durar 20 horas) y han introducido un divertido modo cooperativo con mapas nuevos.

Must have en toda regla.

Nota: 9/10

I bought that game a while ago and I really love it! Especially the Coop-stuff is the best part of the game. Not only that you have the Story-based Coop-Chambers, no. You also get to play custom-chambers. You can do races, play bowling, minigolf and whatnot or you just play normal chambers. If it's Single-Player or Coop, both are reeeally fun. Mock your friends, go on date with your loved one - everything is possible :D
So...
Give it a try! :D <3
진정한 의미에서의 갓겜
AWESOME GAME!!!
自分みたいにゲーム酔いする人は吐きます。その辺を考えて作って欲しかったです。
this is my favourite first person game ever
AMAZING

神作中的神作!
Portal 2 是目前我在Steam平台上最喜爱的游戏没有之一 

听说解谜游戏想要出彩不但解谜玩法要新颖还得加入完整的世界观和剧情 

当随着Chell和Wheatley一起飞行在管道中的时候会看到光圈科技内部 仅仅是空间之大便会令玩家震惊
加上从GLaDOS和Wheatley斗争辩论的对话中玩家渐渐得知大量过去光圈科技的历史 
这种沉浸式而不是灌输式地了解游戏剧情的方式……真是太棒了！

满足了我对Steam游戏的几乎所有要求：
立体空间解谜+轻微射击元素+可双人联机（流畅不卡顿）+自带简体中文+创意工坊（就有了无限多的通关后内容，在此不得不佩服一下老外们的脑洞 ）

努力和基友一起做完了几个高难度合作模式成就 最后迟迟没有完成的两个成就需要另外好友进行联机......目前正在等待两位轻微3D眩晕选手完成单人主线……

2016.11.24更新：目前未发现新入坑玩家 最后两项成就遥遥无期

对比1，2更趋向神作，更多的元素，更丰富的剧情，对游戏节奏的把握，以及前半部分的话唠Wheatley和后半部分的土豆GlaDOS，结尾听着炮塔之歌返回到地面，看到久违的天空阳光，大概很多玩家和我一样莫名的舒了口气
Now,I only want you gone...
Well,finally.

Всем привет. Я расскажу вам про игру Portal 2 . Вся игра Portal 2  основана на прохождении логически сложных уровней с помощью порталов. Ставя два портала в разные места вы можете зайти в один а выйти через другой. Играя с другом некоторые уровни будут веселее чем в одиночной игре. В Portal 2 есть интересные титры которые даже мне было очень интересно посмотреть . Я советую вам игру Portal 2. Скачивайте и будем играть с вами )
Что сказать, это Portal, только лучше, графонистей, с мультиплеером имеющим свою, отдельную кампанию на двоих, а в плане одиночной сюжетки - она шикарна. 10 синих порталов из 10 оранжевых.
This game is AWESOME
Noice! 7.5/10
What can i say... Mind blowing
有一起玩双人工坊的么 ？
I liked this game so much i had to play it again and again until i got it in my soul it just showed good things form level to level. I think there should be portal 3

A great evolution on the first game. The best physics based puzzle game on the market and probably one of the best written games of all time. 

10/10

Yüzüklerin Efendisi ya da Harry Potter gibi düşünün. Oyunu çok seviyorsunuz ve oyunun fanı oluyorsunuz. Oyun artık sizin için çok özel olmuş oluyor.

Ama inceleme için şunları söyleyebilirim. Günümüzün iyi bilgisayarlarını kullanıyorsanız, oyun görüntü ayarlarını high yapın ve 2011 yılında yapılmış bir oyunun aslında ne kadar da kaliteli olduğunu görün.
Buy this game. Buy it and you'll get cake as an added bonus.

Это очень серьезная игра! Первый portal по сравнению с этим детский лепет! Если первый я прошол за 9 (по времени steam) а я соответственно 5 часов побегал и прошол.То В этой части я сам просидел 16 часов, тут есть переходы во времени и неожиданная концовка. Довольно интересно! VELVe Продолжайте в том же духе! Жду 3 часть (если она вообще выйдет)

(obrazek ciastka.txt)
the cake is a lie
Awesome
这个游戏真是太棒了 跟基友一起合作 一起解密 机器人看起来很蠢萌
Muy buen juego, de mas duracion y diversidad de juego que el primero, dialogos e historia muy buena y divertida. liviano para jugarlo en casi cualquier ordenador. muy recomendado

Une expérience de jeu unique !

Suite du premier opus, vous allez devoir une nouvelle fois vous confronter à de nombreux
puzzles.

Comme nouveauté, il y a un workshop où vous pouvez télecharger des salles de tests créées
par la communautée: vous pouvez jouer seul ou avec un ami. 

Vous avez également la possibilité de créer des salles de tests & de les approfondirs.

Conclusion: Un jeu excellent qui contient beaucoup (trop) d'humours.

Je recommande fortement ce jeu ! :)

10/10

Improvements from Portal 1 are notable. 

Co-Op system was genius besides that there is not much random people to play with, you always have your derp friends to help you. 

Map editor works fine. Still, I think the storyline is once again too short. And after that short storyline they leave you with a blank emptyness of "no Portal 3" to keep the adventure going. 

There is yet much story to go here. And we saw a bit of that in this game.

!!GRAB IT SO YOU WOULD NOT REGRET!!

First of all, it is make by Valve!! 
Smooth gameplay, awesome physic and graphics that drop not even 1 fps,

REAL good storyline and puzzle improvement.
To jest tak dobre jak ziemniaki mojej mamy a wiedz że one są bardzo dobre.
pretty good game!
每完成一关，就感觉自己智商又涨了一点。

This game still has me wondering why Valve doesnt want to make more games just because it(Valve) makes more money from the games it sells in the store, this is a solid game.

Generally in Puzzle-games you get given a myriad of puzzles and that's it, End of Story. That's not the case with Portal 2, which has managed to perfectly combine storytelling, puzzles, and humor into a truly beautiful gaming experience. I would highly reccomend purchasing this game at any price, and even picking up the first Portal game with it. (Although Portal 1 is not nearly as long, and feels more like an experiment with the physicis engine, the jokes are still excellent and Portal 2 references its aspects quite frequently. Not necessary though).
Bem legal, oque mais jogo é co-op, porque você tem que ajudar seu amigo e ele te ajuda..
Juego obligatorio

J'ai acheté le 1 et le 2 en pack, pour peu de sous je me suis vraiment éclaté. Un peu rapide à terminer, pas autant prise de tête que prévu mais beaucoup de plaisir. Et une bonne tranche de rigolade aussi.
Mitt absoluta favoritspel! Fantastisk Coop och en extreeeemt rolig singelplayer!!!!

Super jeu acheté en solde pour même pas 5 euros à une période. Je l'ai finit en 16h (mode coop et solo) comptez environ 10-15h de jeu en solo de fonction de votre reflexion car certain niveaux sont pas simples !
Je trouve le jeu un peu court pour ceux qui l'acheteront à 20 euros mais c'est mon avis, le jeu reste vraiment bien.
Portal mit Story und geilen Charakteren. Spielt es!!!einself

Ein extrem gutes Spiel, mal etwas anderes im Gegensatz zu den ganzen fps -und farm games.
Unfassbar genieal gemachte Levels die einen richtig zum Nachdenken bewegen.
Die Atmosphähre und das Leveldesign sind einfach onpoint.

Ich empfehle es auf jeden fall weiter!
Will blow your mind harder than doing shrooms for the first time.
Because who the f*** doesn't like Portal!

この作品には過剰な「機械萌え」を引き起こすおそれがあります。注意しましょう。
ゲームの内容はportalをプレイしたことある人には説明は不要だと思いますが、ほかにはないような新しいタイプの謎解きパズルです。とても画面が回るのでゲーム酔いには注意です。しかし、吐き気を我慢してでもプレイしたいほどにパズルもさることながらキャラクター性もとても魅力的で素敵です。ぜひお手にとってプレイしてみることをおすすめします。
Logical, funny, addictive, all time favourite. Totally recommended.

There's a story about a Scientists who is working on a Super Computer with an Artificial Intelligence
When the Super Computer is complete the Scientists ask "Are there God"
The Computer reaply "There is now"
